name: Fox Girls Never Play Dirty!
description:
Five years after a world war, Ryunosuke travels to the country of Stivale for a change of pace.

While there, he bumps into a fox girl named Serena, and before he knows it, he’s brawling with the police.

Thrust into the middle of her conflict, Ryunosuke decides to have some fun and accompany Serena on her mission to take down the mafia and reform the country.Features:
  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-Based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System


This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.
Buying this game on GOG you will receive a censored version of the game. For more information about the game's content, please visit the publisher's website: Kagura Games
